## invokePost() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Invoke custom POST request to shopware API. Mostly for plugins usage. You can skip domain and pass only endpoint ex. `/api/my/endpoint`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function invokePost({ address, payload, }: {
    address: string;
    payload?: any;
}): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { address, payload, } | <code>{</code><br/><code>    address: string;</code><br/><code>    payload?: any;</code><br/><code>}</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<any>`

## Exceptions

ClientApiError
